name: Twine Template
description:
A free Twine Template Game Edit: I got a suggestion to add variables to the stylesheet to make it easier to change the colours, as well as adding the opendyslexic font and forward/backward buttons, so I'll add that asap. Thanks for the suggestion, @victoriel! ✨

A free template for Twine based on my Out of the Blue UI/design. I've tweaked a few thing to make it a little different, and it's only a simplified version of the original. The template should be fairly easy to use. It’s not fully equipped, as I assume people will want to make it their own, but it should be fully mobile friendly.

I threw this together in a bit of a rush, so if something isn't working right, or looking right, please let me know and I'll fix it as soon as possible. You can also let me know if you want me to add more features/more explanations, or if you need help figuring it out.

Feel free to change it up as you please!

Includes:

  • Responsive/Mobile friendly UI
  • Settings to change theme, font and font size
  • General styling
  • Imported fonts

You'll get further instructions when you download.
